body_html: I have a naive question: since we have torch.tensor() that does the same thing as torch.LongTensor(), why do we need torch.LongTensor()? Or why not just make torch.LongTensor()a wrapper of torch.tensor()?
body_text: I have a naive question: since we have torch.tensor() that does the same thing as torch.LongTensor(),  why do we need torch.LongTensor()? Or why not just make torch.LongTensor()a wrapper of torch.tensor()?
body: I have a naive question: since we have `torch.tensor()` that does the same thing as `torch.LongTensor()`,  why do we need `torch.LongTensor()`? Or why not just make `torch.LongTensor()`a wrapper of `torch.tensor()`?
